data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

This ____ done ____ a ____ apparatus ( we'll ____ it ____ separator ). It ____ of a board ____ three ____ drilled ____ it, forming ____ points ____ an ____ triangle. These points should be at least six inches away from one another, and should be large enough to pass the strands of twine through.
data.partBlankContent: As the strands are twisted, they will tend to grab one another and twist together. To ma__ rope, this tend____ has t_ be contr_____. This i_ done wi__ a sec___ apparatus ( we'll ca__ it t__ separator ). It cons____ of a board wi__ three ho___ drilled i_ it, forming t__ points o_ an equil______ triangle. These points should be at least six inches away from one another, and should be large enough to pass the strands of twine through.
data.fullContent: As the strands are twisted, they will tend to grab one another and twist together. To make rope, this tendency has to be controlled. This is done with a second apparatus ( we'll call it the separator ). It consists of a board with three holes drilled in it, forming the points of an equilateral triangle. These points should be at least six inches away from one another, and should be large enough to pass the strands of twine through.
data.answer: 当这些线被扭曲的时候，它们会倾向于互相抓住并缠绕在一起。为了制作绳索，这种趋势必须加以控制。这是通过第二种设备完成的(我们称之为分离器)。它由一块板组成，板上有三个孔，形成一个等边三角形的点。这些点之间的距离至少要有6英寸，并且要足够大，可以让麻线穿过。
